ygData.subject: RE:  Why me?
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, an interesting story from a friend in Beta Phase 3. He was running around kiting something in South Ro and he saw a small spider in front of him that
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, an interesting story from a friend in Beta Phase 3. He was running
around kiting something in South Ro and he saw a small spider in front of
him that sorta looked like it was climbing over a distant hill. He thought
to himself 'Damn, that perspective's messed up'. Thinking it might have been
some squirrely beta display code he continued kiting and forgot about the
spider. That is until he got the 'Terrorantula hits you for XX damage' at
which point he spun around and saw a leg, just a leg, on his screen. He
didn't take the time to look up as he was quickly fleeing to the zone line.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: Abraham Hardjana [mailto:ahardjan@...]
8)Sent: Sunday, July 25, 1999 2:22 AM
8)To: EQBards
8)Subject: Re: [eqbards] Why me?
8)
8)
8)From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
8)
8)
8)
8)On Sat, 24 Jul 1999, Michal Hobson wrote:
8)> P.S. Has anyone else encountered Terrorantula? He ate our
8)lunch today too.
8)> I had never even heard of him or her whatever it is. It
8)has to be the
8)> biggest creature I have seen to date. Anyone else have a
8)fun encounter
8)> with this behemoth? Feel free to share.
8)
8)Actually a guildmate of mine encountered this beast and wrote
8)a tale about
8)it that will be posted on my guild website in the net few
8)days. When it
8)is I will gladly post the url for you. I thought it was
8)interesting read,
8)though to be honest I thought he wrote the story for
8)roleplaying sake and
8)mad that spider up.
8)
8)Treilanin Loreweaver Bard of Kelethin
8)Aariel Mage of Felwith
8)Honour Guard, Karana
